import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import logo from "../../Images/logo.png"; import "./Navbar.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const Navbar = () => { const [query, setQuery] = useState(""); const navigate = useNavigate(); const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); navigate(`/query/${query}`); }; const logout = () => { window.localStorage.removeItem("token"); navigate("/"); }; return (
setQuery(e.target.value)} />
  • HOME
  • SPORTS
  • GENERAL
  • BUSINESS
  • TECHNOLOGY
  • ENTERTAINMENT
  • HEALTH
); }; export default Navbar;
